content: I thought this was already the case?

The IPS sub-set for non-member countries only has the SCTID, Active status, FSN and preferred (US English) term. It doesn't contain any of the relationships which provide the full value of the ontology.
Yes, it is interesting. And I wasn't aware that it was coming. The next question is, how should/can we use it - in the IPS IG(s) and more generally? We'll need to give this some thought.
Iâ€™d recommend to keep referencing the GPS, while embracing the new visibility of the IPS concepts as a GPS-component that can be developed, explained and curated as a separate entity.
